channel.title: Signal recent changes
channel.description:
At last someone seems interested to remove the Google push server dependency but without free distribution outside the Google's walled garden I think its pretty much still another dependency.
https://twitter.com/t_grote/status/813069649919217664
Also some talk on adding censorship circumvention with Tor as a solution

item.title: Signal recent changes
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
At last someone seems interested to remove the Google push server dependency but without free distribution outside the Google’s walled garden I think its pretty much still another dependency.

twitter.com

Torsten Grote (t_grote)

Work is underway to remove the Google dependency in Signal. Thanks eightbitkid for the work and @moxie for review! github.com/WhisperSystems…
6:11 PM - 25 Dec 2016

Also some talk on adding censorship circumvention with Tor as a solution

Read full topic
